segments.text: Hi , is this Professor Clark ’ s office ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , this is Kalina from your morning literature class .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I had a skydiving accident over the weekend and won ’ t be able to come to school today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I broke my leg , but it is healing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long will you be out of class ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I should be able to return by next Monday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine . Well , thanks for calling and letting me know you will be absent . I hope you feel better soon .
segments.speaker: S2
